mod.name: Fiend Mod
mod.credits: Big thanks to Lisa for character art
mod.description: The Fiend Mod adds a class for Slay The Spire, introducing The Fiend, alongside with 70+ cards, 5 relics, and multiple playstyle.

cards.name: Barrage
cards.description: Deal 3 Damage. Gain 1 Flesh. Draw 1 card. Exhaust.

cards.name: Barrage+
cards.description: Deal 5 Damage. Gain 1 Flesh. Draw 1 card. Exhaust.

cards.name: Dice
cards.description: Deal Damage equal to 5% of target's current HP, then heal for 5% of target's current HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Dice+
cards.description: Deal Damage equal to 5% of target's current HP, then heal for 5% of target's current HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Slice
cards.description: Deal Damage equal to 10% of target's current HP, then gain Flesh equal to 5% of target's current HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Slice+
cards.description: Deal Damage equal to 10% of target's current HP, then gain Flesh equal to 5% of target's current HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Consume
cards.description: Consumes all Flesh. Heals for 0.5% per Flesh of max HP ( !MAX_HP_CONSUME! ). Gain 1 max HP if at least 8 Flesh is consumed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Consume+
cards.description: Consumes all Flesh. Heals for 1% per Flesh of max HP ( !MAX_HP_CONSUME! ). Gain 2 max HP if at least 8 Flesh is consumed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Demon Slash
cards.description: Deal 7 Damage. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Demon Slash+
cards.description: Deal 10 Damage. Gain 1 Stress and 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Gain 1 additional Block for every 4 Flesh. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Fortify+
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Gain 1 additional Block for every 2 Flesh. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Bloodlust
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength and 2 Stress.

cards.name: Bloodlust+
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength and 2 Stress. Draw a card.

cards.name: Conserve
cards.description: Gain X Energy next turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Conserve+
cards.description: Gain X + 1 Energy next turn. Exhaust

cards.name: Demon Whip
cards.description: Deal 6 Damage. Gain 2 Flesh and 1 Stress.

cards.name: Demon Whip+
cards.description: Deal 9 Damage. Gain 3 Flesh and 1 Stress.

cards.name: Demonic Contract
cards.description: Gain 3 Flesh and 2 Curse.

cards.name: Demonic Contract+
cards.description: Gain 5 Flesh and 2 Curse.

cards.name: Fiendish Charge
cards.description: Deal 4 Damage. Apply 1 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Flesh and 1 Stress.

cards.name: Fiendish Charge+
cards.description: Deal 7 Damage. Apply 2 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Flesh and 1 Stress.

cards.name: Meat Paste
cards.description: Apply 4 Flesh. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Meat Paste+
cards.description: Apply 7 Flesh. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Meat Shield
cards.description: Costs 2 Flesh and gain 10 Block. Gain 4 Block if no Flesh. Block from Flesh does not scale with any modifiers.

cards.name: Meat Shield+
cards.description: Costs 2 Flesh and gain 16 Block. Gain 8 Block if no Flesh. Block from Flesh does not scale with any modifiers.

cards.name: Meditate
cards.description: Lose 1 Stress. Draw a card.

cards.name: Meditate+
cards.description: Lose 2 Stress. Draw a card.

cards.name: Radiation
cards.description: Deal 3 Damage. Gain 1 Flesh. Apply 1 Cancer.

cards.name: Radiation+
cards.description: Deal 6 Damage. Gain 2 Flesh. Apply 2 Cancer.

cards.name: Rage
cards.description: Costs 4 Flesh. Gain 2 Vulnerable. Shuffle 5 Barrage into your draw pile. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Rage+
cards.description: Costs 4 Flesh. Gain 2 Vulnerable. Shuffle 6 Barrage+ into your draw pile. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ram
cards.description: Deal Damage equal to 10% of your max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Gain 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Ram+
cards.description: Deal Damage equal to 25% of your max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Gain 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Salvage
cards.description: Gain 4 Flesh. Exhaust.

cards.name: Salvage+
cards.description: Gain 7 Flesh. Exhaust.

cards.name: Splat
cards.description: Costs 1 Flesh. Apply 1 Vulnerable and Weak. Apply 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Splat+
cards.description: Costs 1 Flesh. Apply 2 Vulnerable and Weak. Apply 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Vaccine
cards.description: Costs 1 Flesh. Gain 2 Artifact. Exhaust.

cards.name: Vaccine+
cards.description: Costs 1 Flesh. Gain 4 Artifact. Exhaust.

cards.name: Abomination
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Converts up to 10 Flesh into Strength, Block, Vulnerable, and - Dexterity.

cards.name: Abomination+
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Converts up to 20 Flesh into Strength, Block, Vulnerable, and - Dexterity.

cards.name: Alchemeat
cards.description: Costs 25% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Doubles your Flesh.

cards.name: Alchemeat+
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Doubles your Flesh.

cards.name: Back From Hell
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Retrieve one card from the exhaust pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Back From Hell+
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Retrieve one card from the exhaust pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Black Market
cards.description: Apply all of your Flesh on target. Consumes all Flesh. Gain 4 Gold for each Flesh consumed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Black Market+
cards.description: Apply all of your Flesh on target. Consumes all Flesh. Gain 7 Gold for each Flesh consumed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Blood Price
cards.description: Deal Damage for every 3 missing HP ( !BLOOD_PRICE! ). Not affected by modifiers.

cards.name: Blood Price+
cards.description: Deal Damage for every 2 missing HP ( !BLOOD_PRICE! ). Not affected by modifiers.

cards.name: Cancer
cards.description: Gain 1 Cancer. Ethereal.

cards.name: Cancer+
cards.description: Gain 2 Cancer. Ethereal.

cards.name: Deepen Wound
cards.description: Deal 3 Damage and gain 1 Flesh for every 10% of target's missing HP. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Deepen Wound+
cards.description: Deal 5 Damage and gain 1 Flesh for every 10% of target's missing HP. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Execute
cards.description: Deal 7 Damage. Gain 1 Flesh. 2x Damage and Flesh gain if enemy is below 50% HP. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Execute+
cards.description: Deal 12 Damage. Gain 2 Flesh. 2x Damage and Flesh gain if enemy is below 50% HP. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Flay
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage. Apply 1 GW. Gain 1 Stress and 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Flay+
cards.description: Deal 12 Damage. Apply 2 GW. Gain 1 Stress and 1 Flesh.

cards.name: Flesh Plating
cards.description: Costs 1 Flesh. Gain 2 Plated Armor. Gain 4 Stress.

cards.name: Flesh Plating+
cards.description: Costs 1 Flesh. Gain 3 Plated Armor. Gain 4 Stress.

cards.name: Flesh Whip
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage, Deal 1 additional Damage for every Flesh you have. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Flesh Whip+
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage, Deal 2 additional Damage for every Flesh you have. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Greater Demon Slash
cards.description: Deal 9 Damage. Gain 1 Stress and 2 Flesh.

cards.name: Greater Demon Slash+
cards.description: Deal 14 Damage. Gain 1 Stress and 3 Flesh.

cards.name: Harden
cards.description: Converts all Flesh into Block and Thorns.

cards.name: Harden+
cards.description: Converts all Flesh into Block and Thorns.

cards.name: Infect
cards.description: Apply 3 GW. Deal 3 Damage per GW stack.

cards.name: Infect+
cards.description: Apply 5 GW. Deal 4 Damage per GW stack.

cards.name: Injection
cards.description: Deal 10 Damage. Apply 2 Strength and 4 Flesh. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Injection+
cards.description: Deal 16 Damage. Apply 1 Strength and 4 Flesh. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Leech
cards.description: Steals 2 Flesh. Deal 2 Damage, unaffected by daamge modifiers. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Leech+
cards.description: Steals 4 Flesh. Deal 4 Damage, unaffected by daamge modifiers. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Meat Magnet
cards.description: Steals all of the target's Flesh and deal that much Damage.

cards.name: Meat Magnet+
cards.description: Steals all of the target's Flesh and deal 2x that much Damage.

cards.name: Mutative Arms
cards.description: Costs 3 Flesh. At the start of your turn, play 1 Barrage.

cards.name: Mutative Arms+
cards.description: Costs 3 Flesh. At the start of your turn, play 2 Barrage.

cards.name: Rampage
cards.description: Consumes all Flesh. Deal 4 Damage and lose 1 HP for each Flesh you consumed.

cards.name: Rampage+
cards.description: Consumes all Flesh. Deal 6 Damage and lose 1 HP for each Flesh you consumed.

cards.name: Risky d5
cards.description: 80% chance to heal 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). 20% chance to lose 25% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Exhaust.

cards.name: Risky d5+
cards.description: 80% chance to heal 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). 20% chance to lose 25% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Exhaust. Draw a card.

cards.name: Siphon
cards.description: Deal 1 Damage. Gain 1 Strength. Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Siphon+
cards.description: Deal 1 Damage. Gain 2 Strength. Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Slice and Dice
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP. Draw Slice and Dice. Exhaust.

cards.name: Slice and Dice+
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP. Draw Slice+ and Dice+ (Each now draws a card). Exhaust.

cards.name: Transmeatation
cards.description: Gain 2 Flesh X times.

cards.name: Transmeatation+
cards.description: Gain 3 Flesh X times.

cards.name: Upstart Demon
cards.description: Apply 5 Regenerate. Draw 4 cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Upstart Demon+
cards.description: Apply 5 Regenerate. Draw 7 cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Violent Outburst
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play 1 Demon Slash or Fiendish Charge.

cards.name: Violent Outburst+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play 2 Demon Slash or Fiendish Charge.

cards.name: Amnesia
cards.description: Remove Strength from every unit, including yourself.

cards.name: Amnesia+
cards.description: Remove Strength from every unit, including yourself.

cards.name: Bloodstone
cards.description: Gain 5 Flesh. Can be upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloodstone+1
cards.description: Gain 8 Flesh. Can be upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bribery
cards.description: Pay 30 Gold. Gain 2 max HP. Target loses 2 max HP. Apply that amount as Strength. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bribery+
cards.description: Pay 30 Gold. Gain 4 max HP. Target loses 4 max HP. Apply that amount as Strength. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bulk Up
cards.description: Doubles Flesh. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bulk Up+
cards.description: Triples Flesh. Exhaust.

cards.name: Curse
cards.description: Apply 2 Curse and 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Curse+
cards.description: Apply 3 Curse and 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Feast
cards.description: Costs 6 Flesh. Gain 6 Regen. Exhaust.

cards.name: Feast+
cards.description: Costs 6 Flesh. Gain 8 Regen. Exhaust.

cards.name: Fiend's Grip
cards.description: Costs 4 Flesh and 25% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Deal 16 Damage. Gain 5 max HP if it kills non-minion enemy. Exhaust.

cards.name: Fiend's Grip+
cards.description: Costs 4 Flesh and 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Deal 22 Damage. Gain 5 max HP if it kills non-minion enemy. Exhaust.

cards.name: Flesh For Flesh
cards.description: Consumes all Flesh. Deal 1% of enemy's max HP for every Flesh consumed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Flesh For Flesh+
cards.description: Consumes all Flesh. Deal 1.5% of enemy's max HP for every Flesh consumed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Heal Burst
cards.description: Heal 5% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_5! ). Exhaust. Gain 1 Stress.

cards.name: Heal Burst+
cards.description: Heal 5% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_5! ). Exhaust.

cards.name: Hell Beam
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage. Deal 4 additional Damage for every card in your Exhaust Pile. Exhaust a random card in hand. Gain 2 Stress.

cards.name: Hell Beam+
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage. Deal 8 additional Damage for every card in your Exhaust Pile. Exhaust a random card in hand. Gain 2 Stress.

cards.name: Iron Blood
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain that amount as Block.

cards.name: Iron Blood+
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain that amount as Block.

cards.name: Masochism
cards.description: Lose 25% your max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Gain 3 max HP and 3 Strength. Exhaust.

cards.name: Masochism+
cards.description: Lose 25% your max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Gain 5 max HP and 5 Strength. Exhaust.

cards.name: Mutilation
cards.description: Sets your HP to 1, then gain Flesh for every 2 HP lost. Exhaust.

cards.name: Mutilation+
cards.description: Sets your HP to 1, then gain Flesh for every 1 HP lost. Exhaust.

cards.name: Nom
cards.description: Costs 25% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Deal 8 Damage. Heal 8 HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Nom+
cards.description: Costs 25% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_25! ). Deal 16 Damage. Heal 16 HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Red Stone of Aja
cards.description: Costs 10% of max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Remove all debuffs. Gain Hamon.

cards.name: Red Stone of Aja+
cards.description: Remove all debuffs. Gain Hamon.

cards.name: Satanic Ritual
cards.description: Costs 10% of your max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Converts 5% of all enemies' into Flesh. Exhaust.

cards.name: Satanic Ritual+
cards.description: Costs 10% of your max HP ( !MAX_HP_10! ). Converts 10% of all enemies' into Flesh. Exhaust.

cards.name: Soul Swap
cards.description: Costs 7 Flesh, but consumes all extras. Swaps HP with target, up to a difference of 30 . Exhaust.

cards.name: Soul Swap+
cards.description: Costs 7 Flesh, but consumes all extras. Swaps HP with target, up to a difference of 60 . Exhaust.

cards.name: Unstable Cells
cards.description: Remove Flesh from target. Deal 4 Damage per Flesh removed.

cards.name: Unstable Cells+
cards.description: Remove Flesh from target. Deal 7 Damage per Flesh removed.

relics.name: Fiend Totem
relics.description:
Gain 1 Strength for every 10 non-minion kills (up to 5).
Gain [R] at 10 kills.

relics.name: Soothe Bell
relics.description: Increases your stress limit from 5 to 10.
relics.flavorText: The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder.

relics.name: Flesh Totem
relics.description: At the beginning of combat, gain 1 Flesh for every 20 of your max HP.

relics.name: Blood Totem
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal for 5% of your max HP.

relics.name: Scarf
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Hamon.
relics.flavorText: A scarf made from the wings of many Satiporoja beetles.

keywords.name: Cancer
keywords.description: Causes you to lose 1% HP and gain 1 Flesh each turn.

keywords.name: Curse
keywords.description: Stores 50% of Damage taken and take that amount as Damage at the end of the Curse.

keywords.name: Dice
keywords.description: Deal Damage equal to 5% of target's current HP, then heal for 5% of target's current HP. Exhaust.

keywords.name: Flesh
keywords.description: A resource used by the Fiend. Makes you take less Damage.

keywords.name: Gw
keywords.description: Each Grievous Wound reduces healing received by 10% and deals 1 Damage.

keywords.name: Hamon
keywords.description: The power of Hamon allows you to draw 2 extra cards each turn. Only works if you are above 50% HP.

keywords.name: Keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

keywords.name: Slice
keywords.description: Deal Damage equal to 10% of target's current HP. Gain Flesh. Exhaust.

keywords.name: Stress
keywords.description: At enough Stress, you will lose 1 energy and be unable to draw for a turn. Resets at the end of each turn.
